metadata.description: Create new or use an existing Log Analytic Workspace
Specify the Azure Region for your new or existing OMS workspace
Use an existing Automation account or create a new
Specify the Azure Region for your OMS Automation Account
The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located
The sasToken required to access _artifactsLocation.  When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a sasToken will be automatically generated.

ingestParentRunbook.name: AzureRBACCollector
ingestParentRunbook.description: Runbook to collect RBAC information and metrics into Log Analytics

customSolution.name: Azure RBAC Monitor
customSolution.description: Monitor Azure RBAC Assignments accross management Groups and subscriptions
customSolution.author: volkanc@microsoft.com

variables.AZMONWorkspaceIDDescription: Value of the user's Azure Monitor
variables.AZMONWorkspaceKeyDescription: Encrypted value of the user's omsWorkspaceKey
variables.createScheduleAutomationAccountDescripti: The name of the Automation Account
variables.createScheduleResourceGroupDescription: The name of the resource group

alertArray.description: Azure VMs which shutdown from within operating system  will continue incurring charges. Stop the VM from the portal to prevent unnecessary consumption.
alertArray.query: Type=AzureRBACMonitoring_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory Status_s=Stopped | measure countdistinct(ID_s) by AzureSubscription_s,VmName_s
alertArray.alertName: Azure VM Found in Stopped State

alertArray.description: Each Azure Subscription has quotas for VM cores per region. If the quota is reached new VMs annot be created
alertArray.query: Type=AzureRBACMonitoring_CL MetricName_s=ARMVMUsageStats   | EXTEND div(product(currentValue_d,100),limit_d) as UsedPct | Measure Max(UsedPct) by Location_s,Usagemetric_s | where AggregatedValue >90
alertArray.alertName: Azure Quota Usage Reached  90% of the Subscription Quota
